name: Kaito
description:
Where Kaito’s from, mages train under a single master from childhood until the day of their graduation, where they are tasked with something great. All Kaito had to do was open a portal. What could go wrong?

After unknowingly teleporting himself to the land of Dunia, Kaito must find a way back!

This project's a small game that I had to make for a game development course in my school, and was the final submission for the course. It's a little rough around the edges, but it's fully playable.

Controls (in case it isn't obvious)

  • Z: Accept, Interact
  • X: Decline, Progress Text, 1st Item Slot
  • C: 2nd Item Slot
  • V: Options
  • Arrow Keys: Menus, Movement
